title: Zoe mission
body: Hey guys i have a question here so u know how the last mission for 1K exp tells you to cast 8 "unique" spells building spellthieves edge? I cant do it ... some1 help

replies.body:
If you're confused about how to get that part of the mission done, you need to pickup 8 summoner spells or items either from having the other team use them near you, or picking them up from last hitting certain minions (you'll see the item/spell icon above the minion when they have a spell!). You then just need to use 8 different ones, that part should be pretty clear.

If you're just looking for other players to help you in-game, you're gonna want to post his over in Player Recruitment for that!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bAh1coyt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-14T04:18:12.338+0000)
>
> If you're confused about how to get that part of the mission done, you need to pickup 8 summoner spells or items either from having the other team use them near you, or picking them up from last hitting certain minions (you'll see the item/spell icon above the minion when they have a spell!). You then just need to use 8 different ones, that part should be pretty clear.
> 
> If you're just looking for other players to help you in-game, you're gonna want to post his over in Player Recruitment for that!

thank you sir
